Content:
Here is a list of customer segments from the SBB Nova graph:

| Customer Segment IRI | Label | Identifier | Traveller Type | Min Age | Max Age | Gender |
|----------------------|-------|------------|----------------|---------|---------|--------|
| [Hund](https://lod.opentransportdata.swiss/customersegment/hund) | Hund, Chien, Cane, Dog | HUND | HUND | - | - | - |
| [Hund Abo](https://lod.opentransportdata.swiss/customersegment/hund-abo) | Hund, Chien, Cane, Dog | HUND_ABO | HUND | - | - | - |
| [Reisende mit Behinderung](https://lod.opentransportdata.swiss/customersegment/iv-ai) | Reisende mit Behinderung, Personne avec handicap, per viaggiatori disabili, for Disabled Persons | IV_AI | PERSON | 16 | - | - |
| [Kind 6-16](https://lod.opentransportdata.swiss/customersegment/kind-6-16) | Kind 6-16, Enfant 6-16, Ragazzi 6-16, Children 6-16 | KIND_6-16 | PERSON | 6 | 16 | - |
| [Erwachsene (Dame)](https://lod.opentransportdata.swiss/customersegment/person-25-64-dame) | Erwachsene, Adulti, Adults, Adulte | PERSON_25-64_DAME | PERSON | 25 | 64 | WEIBLICH |
| [Erwachsene (Herr)](https://lod.opentransportdata.swiss/customersegment/person-25-65-herr) | Erwachsene, Adulti, Adults, Adulte | PERSON_25-65_HERR | PERSON | 25 | 65 | MAENNLICH |
| [Velo](https://lod.opentransportdata.swiss/customersegment/velo-vollpreis) | Velo, Vélo, Bici, Bike | VELO_VOLLPREIS | VELO | - | - | - |
| [GA 1. Klasse](https://lod.opentransportdata.swiss/customersegment/ga-1-kl) | GA 1. Klasse, AG 1ère classe, AG 1ª classe, GA Travelcard 1st class | GA_1_KL | PERSON | - | - | - |
| [GA 2. Klasse](https://lod.opentransportdata.swiss/customersegment/ga-2-kl) | GA 2. Klasse, AG 2ème classe, AG 2ª classe, GA Travelcard 2nd class | GA_2_KL | PERSON | - | - | - |
| [Halbtax-Abo](https://lod.opentransportdata.swiss/customersegment/halbtax) | Halbtax-Abo, Abonnement demi-tarif, Abbonamento metà-prezzo, Half-Fare Travelcard | HALBTAX | PERSON | 16 | - | - |
| [Erwachsene 16+](https://lod.opentransportdata.swiss/customersegment/person-16) | Erwachsene, Adulti, Adults, Adulte | PERSON_16+ | PERSON | 16 | - | - |

These segments represent different categories of customers, including age-specific groups, travel card holders, and specific types of travelers like those with disabilities or those traveling with pets.
